oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adult Vaccination for Brucellosis: Why? Why Not?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nicoletti, Paul
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The title of this presentation suggests a parody of the "good news, bad news" stories. Since we are dealing with a serious subject, no comedy is intended and the author will attempt to discuss some of the advantages and disadvantages of adult vaccination against brucellosis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1975; 113-115
